idea: MintUP App India's first micro earning platform helping you to earn monthly from the comforts of home with smartphone on the mobile app. MintUP App is a micro earning and a very simple earning system where you can do micro jobs like watching product advertisement filing surveys giving references on your MintUP App, which helps you to Mint money with your very small effort, now you must be wondering how does MintUP will help you to do that. MintUP App brings advertisements, surveys, opinion and reference submission, and many other micro jobs from branded companies and service providers and makes them sure to reach their targeted audience on MintUP App. All MintUP user need to do is fill profile correctly with MintUP App. Detailed profiling helps to pick up up the best jobs and benefits from companies for you, as soon as your profile gets verified you can start doing the micro job given to you according to your detailed profile. On the completion of a micro job, MintUP App shares the revenue received from clients to users according to MintUP App's patented distribution algorithm which makes sure that everyone connected on the MintUP App should get the best of benefit and earning they deserve. MintUP App never shares any data of the user with any client brand and companies. MintUP App only gives Analytics and provides clients with prospected consumers if our uses want to connect with them on MintUP App. The user earns MintUP points by doing different activities and micro-jobs. MintUP App gives you MintUP points and that USER can redeem on different platforms and also USER can get transferred in their bank account directly.
name: SHRI SIDDHIVINAYAK SOFTECH TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: There are many businesses who have problems related to supply chain management, ERP, CRM solutions etc. These problems if not addressed on time they eventually turn the business into not so successful business operations. Lot of businesses don’t have platforms where they can communicate and generate revenue. Reaching local customers is difficult. This happens mainly because of the lack of technological education and unawareness of the benefits that is brings in to the business in the form or opportunities. Mainly some problems refers to global B2B traders, highly specialized in one goods category and with a strong logistic organization. Changes in practical conditions such as faster distribution, computing and modern marketing have led to changes in their business models and we will solve these gaps with customized solutions.
name: HUMAN QUOTIENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A Trusted home delivery service for fresh and safe seafood and meat foods.

idea:
Dirtcube Interactive LLP is a fast-growing startup located in the Mumbai Area. We are currently focused on building a production house for Interactive Media and Digital Entertainment which includes games, mobile apps, VR, AR, and more.

Our company was founded with one goal in mind - to evolve into an organization that builds truly original products that we ourselves would love to use.

On the mobile games front, we are partnering with international publishers to produce games for a global audience! 

We are also delighted by the incredible response, our first app has received!

Capshot is a mobile content platform for bite-sized humor and entertainment. Unlike other social media applications out there in the market today, our focus is on empowering our users to collaboratively create entertaining content to share with each other - hence multiplying the laughs and increasing engagement. Be it short videos, memes, GIFs or voiceovers - Capshot is the perfect place to create, edit, remix and share content.

A little bit about our journey - Over the last year, we have recruited a passionate team and built our community right from onboarding beta users to now having launched on both Android and iOS. We are excited by the response and love that we have received and are working hard every day to make Capshot the best experience it can possibly be for our users. We hope to capitalise on this momentum as we are now looking to launch in International markets - so that we can achieve our vision of creating a truly global social platform with its foundations being 100% Indian!
name: Dirtcube Interactive LLP

idea: Company will launch APP AND WEBSITE Based exclusive Global B2B Sourcing platform for networking with worldwide textiles manufacturers & Suppliers of Yarn, Fabric, Apparel, Home Textile, Trims, Accessories and Dyestuff & Chemicals. and working towards innovation, development or improvement of products or processes or services, and set up offices in all textiles centres for scalability in terms of employment generation or wealth creation.
name: CND CONNECT TEXTILES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Chillikraut is an ecommerce for home-made food based in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

idea:
Aditya Recruitment Services and Trading LLP is an organization, with an aim to become a One Stop Shop for the Water, Power and Oil & Gas sectors. We offer quality Valves & Pumps to customers at reasonable cost in the shortest time frame possible. We have a wide range of Valves & Pumps in stock of different MOC’s.

Our core values :-

  • Understanding customer applications and needs
  • Competitive pricing
  • Fast, efficient service from friendly well trained staff
  • Availability of wide range of Ex stock products from India’s leading manufacturers
  • Honest & Transparent communication with customer
  • Same-day and next-day delivery
  • Customer Satisfaction
name: ADITYA RECRUITMENT SERVICES AND TRADING LLP

idea:
A2P Mobility Solutions provides cloud telephony services to help companies transform the way customers interact with their brands. Since 2019 we are serving customers in many verticals and provide 24x7 support for our clients.


Our pricing plans for startups are free of rentals and provide full talk-time. Choose as per your calling usage.


CloudPBX Light Plan

INR 7,500 | 5 Users | 6 Months Validity 


This plan provides companies with Multilingual IVR, Inbuilt Call Recording , Detailed Call Dashboard, One DID of Your Choice, Click2call Features etc


Highlights


- Free 15,000 Minutes Included

- 5 Users  

- 6 Months Validity


CloudPBX Medium Plan

INR 15,000 | 5 Users | 1 Year Validity  


This plan provides companies with Multilingual IVR, Inbuilt Call Recording , Detailed Call Dashboard, One DID of Your Choice, Click2call Features etc


Highlights


- Free 30,000 Minutes Included  

- 5 Users 

- 1 Year Validity


Customer Support


All services provided are backed with excellent 24x7 support over email and phone for our products. Start your cloud telephony journey with us. Signup to get a free demo account of our popular calling solution today.
name: A2P Mobility Solutions
